segments.text: We came too early . There're still three hours before the performance starts .

segments.text: I know . Sorry , I shouldn't have rushed you , but I just couldn't stay at home and wait .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind . What about taking a look around the theater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? I'd love to do that .

segments.text: Here we go . There is a museum of the Beijing Opera art .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . Look at this . So delicate and beautiful . Did ancient Chinese people really wear them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . They are just opera costumes . Do you like the embroidery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I surely do . They must have had advanced machine in ancient China to do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , no , no . They are all handmade , girl . You know , the ancient Chinese women were supposed to be good at needlework .
segments.speaker: S1
